# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I suggest we start our negotiation at $150. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the exceptional service and support we provide with every purchase. I look forward to your response and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
